channel.title: Client connection problem
channel.description: i download vintage pk client and am editting atm, and when i ran it, there wasn't an ip thing there, it just said username and password, so i thought it was auto set at 127.0.0.1 so i typed in my user and pass and it said error connecting to server, how do i make the default ip my server ip. if i put my server address on here i'm afraid i'd get found for spamming
